Package GUIElements

Class ScrollableTextBox

java.lang.Object
GUIElements.GUIElement
GUIElements.Container
GUIElements.ScrollableTextBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScrollBarListener
public class ScrollableTextBox
extends Container
Class that implements the scrolling feature for the TextBox. It contains a TextBox and one scrollbar. All uncommented methods are redirections to the TextBox methods.

  • Field Summary

      y - - y coordinate of the ScrollableTextBox
      textBox - - Textbox contained in this ScrollableTextBox
